results.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX: Tag Force

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10. (We don't like 9)
  • Processor: A working one
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Preferably yes
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that can make underwater sounds
  • Additional Notes: The game runs on most computers from the last 6 years
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 14
  • Processor: A working one that's also really really fast
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Like 1000 graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A plugged in semi-acoustic guitar for that authentic clam sound
  • Additional Notes: We don't know if Clam Man runs on computers from the future
